w 0x00000001 0x12345678;
w 0x00000002 0x000000ff;
w 0x00000003 0x0000ff00;
w 0x00000004 0x00ff0000;
n 10;
w 0x00000010 0x12345678;
w 0x00000020 0x000000ff;
w 0x00000030 0x0000ff00;
w 0x00000040 0x00ff0000;
r 0x00000001 0x12345678;
n 10
w 0x00000001 0x12345678;
w 0x00000002 0x000000ff;
w 0x00000003 0x0000ff00;
w 0x00000004 0x00ff0000;
n 10;
w 0x00000010 0x12345678;
w 0x00000020 0x000000ff;
w 0x00000030 0x0000ff00;
w 0x00000040 0x00ff0000;
r 0x00000001 0x12345678;
